definition.name: Go Release Binaries
definition.description: Build and Release Go Binaries to GitHub Release Assets
definition.author: Jay Zhang <wangyoucao577@gmail.com>

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: GITHUB_TOKEN for uploading releases to Github asserts.

inputs.name: goos
inputs.description: GOOS is the running programs operating system target: one of darwin, freebsd, linux, and so on.

inputs.name: goarch
inputs.description: GOARCH is the running programs architecture target: one of 386, amd64, arm, s390x, loong64 and so on.

inputs.name: goamd64
inputs.description: GOAMD64 is the running programs amd64 microarchitecture level: one of v1, v2, v3, v4.

inputs.name: goarm
inputs.description: GOARM is the running programs arm microarchitecture level: ARMv5,ARMv6,ARMv7

inputs.name: gomips
inputs.description: GOMIPS is the running programs mips microarchitecture level: hardfloat,softfloat

inputs.name: goversion
inputs.description: The `Go` compiler version.

inputs.name: build_flags
inputs.description: Additional arguments to pass the go build command.

inputs.name: ldflags
inputs.description: Values to provide to the -ldflags argument

inputs.name: project_path
inputs.description: Where to run `go build .`

inputs.name: binary_name
inputs.description: Specify another binary name if do not want to use repository basename

inputs.name: pre_command
inputs.description: Extra command that will be executed before `go build`, may for solving dependency

inputs.name: build_command
inputs.description: The actual command to build binary, typically `go build`.

inputs.name: executable_compression
inputs.description: Compression executable binary by some third-party tools. Only `upx` is supported at the moment.

inputs.name: extra_files
inputs.description: Extra files that will be packaged into artifacts either.

inputs.name: md5sum
inputs.description: Publish `.md5` along with artifacts.

inputs.name: sha256sum
inputs.description: Publish `.sha256` along with artifacts.

inputs.name: release_tag
inputs.description: Upload binaries to specified release page that indicated by Git tag.

inputs.name: release_name
inputs.description: Upload binaries to specified release page that indicated by release name.

inputs.name: release_repo
inputs.description: Repository to upload the binaries

inputs.name: overwrite
inputs.description: Overwrite asset if it's already exist.

inputs.name: asset_name
inputs.description: Customize asset name if do not want to use the default format.

inputs.name: retry
inputs.description: How many times retrying if upload fails.

inputs.name: post_command
inputs.description: Extra command that will be executed for teardown work

inputs.name: compress_assets
inputs.description: Compress assets before uploading

inputs.name: upload
inputs.description: Upload release assets or not

inputs.name: multi_binaries
inputs.description: Build and package multiple binaries together

outputs.name: release_asset_dir
outputs.description: Release file directory provided for use by other workflows
